- [https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/ankanhore545/carbon-dioxide-emissions-of-the-world](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/ankanhore545/carbon-dioxide-emissions-of-the-world)

## Cleaning the Data
- I have shrunk the data into only years from 1990 to 2018.
